ModMetaData.name: Rimjobworld
ModMetaData.author: Void Main & RimJobWorld Community Project Team
ModMetaData.description: Adds body parts: genitals, anus & breasts. Adds sexual need into the game. Adds rape into the game. Adds comfort prisoner feature. Adds pregnancy (this feature will be automatically disabled if you have Children & Pregnancy mod). Adds 'simple' baby (this feature will be automatically disabled if you have Children & Pregnancy mod). Adds whore bed: a colonist assigned to this bed will try to hookup with others. Adds STDs.
